name: alauncher
description: ALauncher - Modern Minecraft Launcher with React and Tauri

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspaces
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist-builds packages/frontend/dist packages/backend/dist packages/shared dist node_modules
scripts.build:windows: cd packages/frontend && npx tauri build --target nsis,msi
scripts.build:linux: cd packages/frontend && npx tauri build --target deb,rpm
scripts.build:macos: cd packages/frontend && npx tauri build --target dmg,app
scripts.build:all: cd packages/frontend && npx tauri build --target deb,rpm,appimage,dmg,app,nsis,msi
